text: اوفوا۟ الكيل ولا تكونوا۟ من المخسرين

translations.translation: Give full measure. Do not skimp.
Give full measure and do not cheat;
Fill up the measure and do not diminish the goods of people,
Maintain just measure in your business and do not cause loss to others.
“Measure in full, and do not be of those who reduce.”
Give full measure, and cause no loss (to others)."
Give a full measure and be not of those who diminish;
Fill up the measure, and be not cheaters,
Give full measure, and be not of those who give less (than the due).
Give full measure, and cause no loss to others.
Give full measure, and be not of those who cause others to lose.
Observe the full measure, and do not be of those who give short measure.
Give just measure, and cause no loss (to others by fraud).
Give full measure, and cause no loss (to others).
Fill up the measure, do not be among the cheats,
Give full measure, and do not cheat.
Give full measure and do not be of those who cause loss.
[26:181] Give full measure and do not be of those who give short measure,

Give full measure) when you measure or weigh, (and be not of those who give less (than the due)) in measurement and weighing; this is because they were well known for giving less than what is due in measurement.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وعليكم أيها المكلفون المنحرفون عن جادة العدالة الإلهية إيفاء الكيل { أَوْفُواْ ٱلْكَيْلَ } إبقاءً تاماً كاملاً { وَلاَ تَكُونُواْ } بتنقيصه وتطفيفه { مِنَ ٱلْمُخْسِرِينَ } [الشعراء: 181] الناقصين حقوق عباد الله؛ حتى لا يخسركم رحمته
